actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5 of the United States Code to require an independent physical examination of employees of the Government of the United States seeking compensation for work injuries.

summary.text: Requires physical examination of employees of the Government of the United States seeking compensation for work injuries.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5 of the United States Code to require an independent physical examination of employees of the Government of the United States seeking compensation for work injuries.
